statements: UPDATE client_health_records SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE client_id = 12345;
UPDATE client_health_records SET phone_number = '9876543210', address = '123 Main Street' WHERE client_id = 54321;
UPDATE client_health_records SET phone_number='123-456-7890', address='123 Main St' WHERE client_id=1
UPDATE client_health_records SET email='john.doe@example.com', client_name='John Doe' WHERE client_id=2
UPDATE ClientHealthRecords SET age = 30 WHERE client_id = 101
UPDATE TreatmentPlans SET treatment_status = 'Completed', therapist_notes = 'Client responded well to treatment' WHERE plan_id = 201
UPDATE ClientHealthRecords SET age = 35, health_condition = 'Stable' WHERE client_id = 12345;
UPDATE TreatmentPlans SET treatment_description = 'Physical Therapy', therapist_notes = 'Client responding well to treatment' WHERE client_id = 54321;
UPDATE client_health_records SET medical_condition = 'Hypertension' WHERE client_id = 1;
UPDATE treatment_plans SET start_date = '2022-09-15', end_date = '2023-03-30' WHERE plan_id = 2;
UPDATE client_health_records SET birthdate = '2000-05-15', medical_condition = 'Asthma' WHERE client_id = 103;
UPDATE treatment_plans SET start_date = '2022-01-10', therapy_type = 'Physical Therapy' WHERE plan_id = 201;
UPDATE health_records SET name='John Doe', email='johndoe@example.com' WHERE client_id=1;
UPDATE treatment_plans SET plan_description='Weekly check-ups', plan_end_date='2023-02-28' WHERE plan_id=5;
UPDATE health_records SET name='Alice Smith', phone_number='555-1234' WHERE client_id=1;
UPDATE treatment_plans SET plan_description='New Plan Description', plan_end_date='2023-12-31' WHERE plan_id=3;
UPDATE client_health_records SET age = 35 WHERE client_id = 101
UPDATE therapists SET specialization = 'Cognitive Behavioral Therapy' WHERE therapist_id = 201
UPDATE client_health_records SET age = 35, health_condition = 'Stable' WHERE client_id = 101
UPDATE treatment_plans SET diagnosis = 'Improved mental health' WHERE therapist_id = 201 AND start_date >= '2022-01-01'
